summary: Man of Tai Chi is a 2013 Chinese-American martial arts film directed by and starring Keanu Reeves in his directorial debut, and co-stars Tiger Chen, Iko Uwais, Karen Mok and Simon Yam. Man of Tai Chi is a multilingual narrative, partly inspired by the life of Reeves' friend, stuntman Tiger Chen.
cast:
Keanu Reeves as Donaka Mark
Tiger Chen as Tiger Chen Linhu
Karen Mok as Sun Jing Shi
Simon Yam as Superintendent Wong
Ye Qing as Qing Sha
Yu Hai as Master Yang
Sam Lee as Tak Ming
Michael Tong as Policeman Yuan
Iko Uwais as Gilang Sanjaya
Silvio Simac as Uri Romanov
